Metadata: Requalification of a platform in Cook Inlet, Alaska
"Offshore Technology Conference," pp. 551-562, Houston, Texas, May 4-7, 1992.

This paper outlines and illustrates an engineering evaluation procedure for re-â€‹qualification of high consequence offshore platforms. The procedure is illustrated with application to a Cook Inlet platform that was damaged by a blowout. The analyses and evaluations documented in this paper indicate that the damage was successfully repaired, and that the structure in its repaired condition is fit for purpose.
